name: Bulgur Salad
description: This bulgur salad with tomatoes, cucumber, and bell peppers is super fresh, healthy, and light. It makes the perfect lunch and it's ready in less than 20 minutes!

recipeInstructions.text: Add the bulgur to a small pot together with the tomato paste.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegetable broth and bring to a boil. Turn off the heat and let it soak for 10 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: In the meanwhile, chop the cucumber, the tomato, and the bell pepper. Cut the green onions into rings.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the fresh parsley and the mint.

recipeInstructions.text: Squeeze the lemon. Set the juice aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, green onion, parsley, mint, olive oil, and lemon juice. Season with salt and pepper.
